thread.title: Barb
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Barb

author: Barb
title: Barb
text: I've used Bake Me a Wish twice. It's perfect for when you wish you were there - nothing like celebrating with cake! I've ordered - both times - the 12 mini gourmet cupcakes. Both recipients tell me they were delicious. Cupcakes were packed in dry ice and arrived in perfect condition - icing didn't slide around and cake wasn't smashed. They tasted fresh - I was told - and were quite delicious. Each recipient had there own favorite flavor. The variety selection allows the recipient to try many flavors and make that choice.
